name: Beat the Heat (HSMIC)
description: Beat the Heat is a sci-fi-style game that is meant to bring awareness to the dangers of global warming. Taking place in California, in a theoretically plausible future, you are chosen to save the Earth from the fatal effects of climate change. With wildfires and heat waves scattered across California, you must vacuum fossil fuels out of the air in order to clean the atmosphere and rehabilitate the uninhabitable plains of California.
